attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Where I in live North Cambridgeshire there are no skilled jobs unless you count poorly paid temporary land work, care work or barmy schemes that just massage the dole figures and do nothing to help.  Here in my town there are skilled people wanting skilled work, ranging from IT managers like myself to doctors, to welders etc.  Should people be thrown away on useless schemes, fored to work in jobs they have not been trained for and treated like criminals if they don't.  This is what the government is proposing to do with the benefits system.  I urge all decent people to fight this unjust system.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement, about Government policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
